raw_text: BERHARDT (JUNE) MARIE THOMAZINE (nee LUDOWYK) – Dearly beloved wife of John Maurice,​ loving mother of Horace,​ Steuart,​ Jerome (all of Australia),​ Sherlock and Veron,​ mother-in-law of Romaine,​ Perin (Australia),​ Tracy and Delika,​ beloved grandmother of Kirk,​ Amanda,​ Dexter,​ Derick,​ Josh,​ Jadin,​ Natalie,​ Sherwyn,​ Trent and Delvin,​ passed away peacefully on 10th October 2023. Remains will lie at A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour from 9.00 a.m. to 10.00 p.m. on Friday,​ the 13th. Cortege leaves parlour at 4.00 p.m. on Saturday,​ 14th October for burial at the General Cemetery,​ Borella,​ Roman Catholic Section.065378

LIYANAARACHCHI – LAL (Retired Director General,​ Civil Aviation Authority,​ member of SLAS),​ dearly beloved husband of Chandrani (nee Dissanayake),​ loving father of Muditha,​ Denuka (Australia),​ father-in-law of Nadeeka,​ brother of Deepal,​ Nimal,​ Daya and Nihal,​ brother-in-law of Ajantha,​ late Ramya,​ Daya and Vijitha,​ passed away peacefully on the 10th of October 2023. Remains will lie at A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour on Friday,​ the 13th of October,​ from 9.00 a.m. to 10.00 p.m. Cortege leaves parlour at 10.30 a.m. on Saturday,​ the 14th of October,​ for cremation at 11.00 a.m. at the General Cemetery,​ Borella (Old Crematorium). Tel. Muditha Liyanaarachchi – 0703221898.065329

WATSON – PATRICIA INDRAWANTHI (nee NEVINS SELVADURAI). Much loved wife of late Prince V.C. Watson,​ cherished mother of Saty,​ Suven,​ Yami and Anjali,​ loving mother-in-law of Nicola,​ Jayantha,​ Dinesh and Andrew; blessed grandmother of Tahlia,​ Shan,​ Ayla and Amara; beloved daughter of the late Dr. D.D.N. & late Viola Nevins Selvadurai; dearest sister/​sister-in-law of Anton & late Mercy & late Leila,​ Letty & late Vernon,​ Felicia & late Reggie,​ Timothy & Indranee,​ DDN & Christine,​ Stephen & Gnana,​ Paul & Debbie and Rohini & Luke; much loved cousin and Aunt of a large extended family across the globe. She passed away peacefully at home. Funeral at A.F. Raymond Parlour,​ Borella,​ 13th October 2023 opening from 11.30 a.m. Service at 3.15 p.m. Cremation at 5 p.m. Old Crematorium Borella,​ Kanatta.064911
